recipesJson.name: Georgia Cardinal
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
If you have not tried @Fear Cardinal recipe, please do yourself a favor and mix it.  It is delish.  Summer and Fall of 2017, I kept at least 500ml of this ready to vape all the time.  I have a problem with peaches, I love them.  So, I thought what would Cardinal be like with Peach?  So, I tried it and came up with **GA Cardinal**.  Why not Peach Cardinal?  Well, have you seen a Peach Cardinal?  
So, I kept the base recipe the same.  I added **FA White Peach** and **FA Apricot**.  What comes out of this, is a delicious RY4 tobacco with a caramelized Peach on the exhale.  I am in love.  
Enjoy

reviews.text: I'm not a peach lover. Not at all. This recipe has shown me when properly balanced peaches are awesome. It's a great recipe.

My partner and I have been killing 100's of ml's of cardinal - and we were looking for a different spin on it, so we mixed this up. See the thing is with a mtl setup, the throat hit is evertything (looking at you mr Peach White). Thanks for this recipe, its delicious.
This Mix is awesome! I'm in love with that! Great Job.

After two weeks I am in love with this mix.  Running it in a MTL  rda  on the inhale I get a light peach followed by a delightful slightly sweet tobacco . NEVER in a million years would I think that I would enjoy a tobacco mix , but this has started me down the tobacco rabbit hole .  So dont be ascared of tobacco people!!
After a week steep the peach held up to the tobaccos. Light peach flavor and Fearâ€™s Cardinal. 8% RY4 was a worry for me but seems where it needed to be. Great job Tammy!
